title: Requires every school to have at least one person certified in CPR and first aid while pupils are present
summary: Directs schools to have present at all times during which pupils are present at least one person certified in cardiopulmonary resuscitation and first aid; outlines the requirements to be established by the commissioner of education for certification in cardiopulmonary resuscitation and first aid; notes that such direction shall not be deemed to satisfy the requirements of any other provision of law relative to health education or school nurses.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring every school to have at least one person certified in cardiopulmonary resuscitation and first aid present while pupils are in attendance
